evidence.claim: JISEKI Health complies with HIPAA regulations for data privacy and security in healthcare.
The company uses X12 standards for electronic data interchange in healthcare transactions.
JISEKI offers integration capabilities with EHR systems and complies with FHIR standards.
JISEKI provides solutions that support HL7 messaging standards.

icp.icp_reason: Focus on health tech and EDI suggests they use X12 for claims and eligibility.
